item.title: Homebrew
item.description: Install Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)" Check if Homebrew is installed and working properly. brew -v Use USTC Mirro Homebrew Core # replace brew.git cd "$(brew --repo)" git remote set-url origin https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/brew.git # replace homebrew-core.git cd "$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core" git remote set-url origin https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/homebrew-core.git Bottles For bash user echo 'export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/homebrew-bottles' >> ~/.bash_profile source ~/.bash_profile For zsh user echo 'export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/homebrew-bottles' >> ~/.zshrc source ~/.zshrc Reset # reset brew.git cd "$(brew --repo)" git remote set-url origin https://github.
